content:
import { Meteor } from 'meteor/meteor'; import { withTracker } from 'meteor/react-meteor-data'; import React from 'react'; import './landingpage.scss'; export default class Landingpage extends React.Component { constructor(props){ super(props) } render(){ return (

Welcome to the

Parasponia Genebook

This is the central resource for comparative genomics of Parasponia andersonii and Trema orientalis.
It includes all Genebook functionality, and allows downloading of various data.

Create an account Sign in About Genebook

Gene list

Browse through a list of genes with customizable queries
Browse

Advanced search

Search genomes, genes, experiments, meta-data etc.
Search

BLAST

BLAST your protein or DNA sequence to full genomes and annotations
Blast
) } };

content:
# Genebook
## A collaborative notebook for genes and genomes
----
Full documentation is at http://genebook.readthedocs.io/
----
### Requirements:

* node.js >= 8.9.4 (on mac: ```brew install node```, on linux: ```apt-get install nodejs```)
* mongodb >= 3.4 (on mac: ```brew install mongodb```, on linux: ```apt-get install mongodb```)
* meteor (```curl https://install.meteor.com/ | sh```) 


To run a small example in development mode:

Install dependencies and fire up meteor in development mode

```
meteor npm install --save
meteor
```

Load test data

```
node scripts/add_test_data.sh
```

Navigate to http://localhost:3000

Browse genomes, genomic annotations and expression levels. Update functionality, version history.
name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "genebook",
  "version": "0.1.0-alpha",
  "repository": "https://github.com/holmrenser/genebook",
  "description": "A portable website for browsing and querying genome sequences and annotations",
  "license": "AGPL-3.0",
  "scripts": {
    "docs": "esdoc .esdoc.json"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@babel/runtime": "^7.0.0-beta.42",
    "asteroid": "^2.0.3",
    "bcrypt": "^0.8.7",
    "bootstrap": "^4.0.0",
    "buffer-shims": "^1.0.0",
    "bufferutil": "^1.3.0",
    "child-process": "^1.0.2",
    "child-process-promise": "^2.2.1",
    "classnames": "^2.2.5",
    "core-util-is": "^1.0.2",
    "d3": "^4.13.0",
    "d3-hierarchy": "^1.1.5",
    "d3-scale": "^1.0.7",
    "d3-scale-chromatic": "^1.2.0",
    "esdoc": "^1.0.4",
    "esdoc-accessor-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "esdoc-brand-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "esdoc-coverage-plugin": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-ecmascript-proposal-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "esdoc-external-ecmascript-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "esdoc-integrate-manual-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "esdoc-integrate-test-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "esdoc-jsx-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "esdoc-lint-plugin": "^1.0.1",
    "esdoc-publish-html-plugin": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "esdoc-type-inference-plugin": "^1.0.1",
    "esdoc-undocumented-identifier-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "esdoc-unexported-identifier-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "fibers": "^1.0.15",
    "file-saver": "^1.3.3",
    "file-type": "^4.4.0",
    "font-awesome": "^4.7.0",
    "fs.extra": "^1.3.2",
    "glob": "^7.1.2",
    "html-entities": "^1.2.1",
    "immutability-helper": "^2.6.6",
    "install": "^0.10.4",
    "jquery": "^3.3.1",
    "lodash": "^4.17.5",
    "meteor-babel-helpers": "0.0.3",
    "meteor-node-stubs": "^0.2.11",
    "npm": "^5.7.1",
    "object-hash": "^1.3.0",
    "papaparse": "^4.3.7",
    "react": "^16.2.0",
    "react-alert": "^2.4.0",
    "react-bootstrap": "^0.31.5",
    "react-container-dimensions": "^1.3.3",
    "react-dom": "^16.2.0",
    "react-mounter": "^1.2.0",
    "react-select": "^1.2.1",
    "recompose": "^0.26.0",
    "request": "^2.85.0",
    "rus-diff": "^1.1.0",
    "simpl-schema": "0.0.3",
    "spawn-promise": "^0.1.8",
    "spawn-sync": "^1.0.15",
    "thread-sleep": "^2.0.0",
    "try-thread-sleep": "^1.0.2",
    "utf-8-validate": "^2.0.0",
    "ws": "^1.1.5",
    "xml2js-es6-promise": "^1.1.1"
  }
}
